header.pending: Your application is under review. You will be notified once it has been approved.
header.rejected: Your application was not approved. Reason: {{reason}}. Please contact support if you need assistance with reapplying.
header.rejected_no_reason: Your application was not approved. Please contact support for more information.

notFound.title: Vendor Profile Not Found
notFound.description: Please complete your vendor onboarding first.

overview.title: Dashboard Overview
overview.noLocations: You haven't added any static locations yet.
overview.addLocationPrompt: Add a location in the 'Locations' tab.
overview.addAnnouncementPrompt: Post an update from the 'Announcements' tab.

profile.title: Business Profile
profile.subtitle: This information will be displayed publicly on your vendor page.
profile.roleDescription: Switch to the customer view to explore the app as a user.

gallery.title: Gallery Management
gallery.subtitle: Upload images to showcase your products and setup.
gallery.galleryDescription: These images are displayed on your public vendor page.
gallery.dropOrBrowse: Drop images here or click to browse
gallery.fileTypes: JPEG, PNG, WebP up to 5MB each
gallery.uploadFirst: Upload your first image to start building your gallery.

locations.title: Manage Locations
locations.subtitle: Add and manage your frequent business locations for quick access.

announcements.title: Announcements
announcements.subtitle: Post updates for your followers. The latest announcement will be shown on your vendor page.
announcements.messagePlaceholder: What's new? (e.g., 'Special menu item today!', 'Closing early at 8pm')

live.title: Go Live
live.subtitle: Start a live session to appear on the map for customers.

alerts.startSessionError: Failed to start live session. Please try again.
alerts.locationDenied: Location access denied. Please enable location permissions and try again.
alerts.locationUnavailable: Location information is unavailable. Please try again.
alerts.locationTimeout: Location request timed out. Please try again.
alerts.endSessionError: Failed to end live session. Please try again.
alerts.profileSaveError: Failed to save profile. Please try again.
